summary: This mod adds in a room containing 25 bookcases connected the Severin Manor, the player home in Solstheim. This is compatible with my other Severin Manor mod and simply adds the door next the the display room door from my other mod.
descriptionHtml: The mod adds a library (initially empty) to store all your books. The library contains 25 bookcases allowing 1350 books to be stored. The room is accessed from the lower level of Severin Manor immediately left after descending the stairs. Being in Severin Manor requires the you own the Dragonborn DLC.
author: Nighthunter101
